message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this amazing product with you. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $12,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $18,000 might be a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12,000. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $14,000 is closer, but still a little more than I was hoping to spend.  Would you be willing to do $13,000?
Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13,000. How about we compromise at $13,500?
